location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, informing that there will be three cruizers of the Company in the Persian Gulf.
